ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Quest Gems
ygData.msgSnippet: Begging your pardon - I don t know who you folks are so if you don t mind please delete my name from your distribution list. I appreciate it. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Begging your pardon - I don't know who you folks are so if you don't mind please delete my name from your distribution list. I appreciate it.
----- Original Message -----
From: Christopher Sanders
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Friday, August 30, 2002 10:37 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Quest Gems


heh...yeah, I've heard that. Only problem is, nobody wants to go to SG
anymore, and those see-invis things are always up...at least when I go to
look.

Hey...it's a good thing SWG is getting closer and closer...between NWN and
my lil' Necro, I'll keep busy until then. :)

Thanks. :)

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Friday, August 30, 2002 10:17 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Quest Gems


Siren's Grotto IMHO is the best place to farm gems. Get a good group (you
can CC there). For BP gems - siren city is ideal - they drop like flies.
Only problem is getting there if the see invis Fish is at the bottom of the
well..

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 29, 2002 8:02 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone Out There?


I'm 0% into 53. Gotta love that new UI. :)

Working on Thurg armor. I think it'll be easier to buy the gems, than to
try to kill the wyverns in CS. The gem drops seem slow...and quad kiting
casters can really tick you off. I'm thinking of going someplace with
greens that I can just mow through with AE's. Can't be much more tedious
than running in circles chant kiting on that little spit of land in CS.

Then it's just a matter of getting into Kael, in a guild where I'm the low
person, and everyone else has mostly HoT gear.

I suppose it's no wonder I've taken my necro from 13-17 this week... :/ Oh
well.

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 29, 2002 8:42 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone Out There?


I'm here also! Now guild leader and just got a pair of Twilight Greaves
this week!

Slyde Katzenjammer
60 Bard on Xegony
Guild Leader - House Kel'Dar
